about_the_game:
This is a demo version of 'Acretia - Guardians of Lian'.
you can play stage '2-8 A Ship On The Mountain' and '2-8 The Airship Hangar'.

《Synopsis》
Two worlds merged. A feud that lasted for hundreds of years. The flame of destruction slowly pulsates in the gap.
Join your legion on a great journey to cut the chains of hatred and save the world from the primordial darkness.

content_descriptors.notes:
Outfits that are revealing.
Depicting battles scene without showing blood.
Some of the dialog contains light profanity.

This game does not have topics as sexual assault/non-consensual sex, drug/alcohol abuse, or self-harm.
